author: hanniabu
content:
I'm in the process of updating validatorqueue.com for Pectra and was wondering if there's any changes to entry churn?

I see the MaxEB spec changes the exit churn to 256 ETH with excess going to consolidation, but no mention of entry churn. I'm assuming that remains capped at 256 ETH as well? (previously 8 validators)
